participant_1.background:
I just cooked my family some spaghetti.
i dream of winning the lottery.
my husband was a salesman.
I love to watch my mother dance, so I put a ballerina mobile in my nursery to remind me of her.
I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.

participant_2.background:
I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult.
I've never been afraid to try new things, but my first time competing in a beauty pageant was definitely the most difficult thing I've ever done.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.
I do yoga every morning to keep my body healthy and flexible, but I'm not able to go to high altitudes because of my condition.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: I know right?! I love the outdoors but I do have to do a bit of work around the house.
I love to cook and I just made spaghetti for my family.
Oh that sounds delicious! I love lasagna.
My husband was a salesman and he loved to cook too.
I used to be a bit of a procrastinator but now I'm not afraid to try new things.
I used to put off doing chores but now I do them right away because I would rather spend time with my pets.
That's great! I wish I had more time to spend with my family.
I'm actually going to go see my mom today. She's a wonderful dancer and I put a ballerina mobile in my nursery to remind me of her.
That's so sweet! My mom passed away a few years ago so I'm trying to make the most of the time I have left with my family.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm sure she's watching over you.
Thanks. I'm sure she is too
